website_summaries.verdict: A fun animal-themed balance bike that is designed for toddlers 2 and up.
pros: This height-adjustable balance bike is available as a dinosaur, a horse, or a unicorn
The shock-absorbing wheels provide a smooth ride and the adjustable handlebar features soft, comfortable grips
cons: Although it is intuitive, some kids might need a little help learning exactly where to sit

customer_reviews.title: Great first balance bike!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is better than described. my little nephew loves it and he looks so adorable riding it. Wheels are nice and slim and the plush toy is great for a soft landing. The bike is quite lightweight and well designed, great for teaching the little onebalance and confidence. Especially when he has soft cuddly friend attached. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Analei

customer_reviews.title: Really cool - love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she’s crazy for it. She continuously stops just to hug her little Unicorn friend 😂. Good quality too. I would love to see some different versions with new animals. I would have loved to buy a dragon for my other niece! (her mommy’s Game of Thrones/ dragons obsession might be rubbing off on her lol!)
customer_reviews.author: Analei

customer_reviews.title: My 3.5 year old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old son loves 'riding' this around. His sisters love it too, so it actually becomes a point of contention sometimes. I will say that sometimes the hooks that attach the dinosaur head to the bike come loose and I find myself having to reclip those from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Greene

customer_reviews.title: Princess loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, child loves it, shrieked for joy when she saw the picture of it on the box, FORCED me to put it together that instant. She's 2 and 5 months, so this is more her speed than even a trike with pedals, because pedaling is confusing. Half the time she goes the wrong way, and only ever a few feet before she stops or turns. This thing she can do "by self"!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas I.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Received earlier than expected! Awesome just like photo, light weight
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for learners!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. The cushioning on this bike leads to much bravery for the rider. No fear of falling and getting hurt, because it doesn’t hurt to fall! The kids love it! My five year old grandson put it together for his 3 yr old sister, so assembly is obviously pretty easy 😉
customer_reviews.author: Marie Marks

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my great-niece who is almost 2. It was hard to decide since they were all cute but I got the horse. It is well made and was easy for a 60 year old woman to put together by herself. My great-niece immediately swung her leg over and took several steps. I think it will be played with for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing ever!!! I thought it was going to be too small for my 3 year old nephew but it wasn’t at all. The Dino covering also provided protection from the metal handle bars. The only con to this bike is that when the cover is on it is a little hard for him to “find” the seat when he is getting on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant bike -  fully adjustable
customer_reviews.text: lightweight and solid. My great nephew loves it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Analei

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Within two uses one is the metal clips that holds the dinosaur head on came off without any real way to repair it. It was the perfect size for our two year old but he was sadly disappointed with the flopping head on his new Dino bike.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Berry

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Bike FTW
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves her unicorn bike. It’s pretty small though so she’s already too big for it. But the unicorn snaps right on and off but not too easy. Wish the balance bike itself was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Sides

customer_reviews.title: Not practical, very difficult to ride.
customer_reviews.text: Just couldn't give it 5 stars because the head of the horse keeps coming off and detaching from the hooks. Trying to balance and move the horse head out of the way made for a not so pleasant ride.
customer_reviews.author: wesley hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea. Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea. The dinosaur made it a little hard for my 2yr old sone to use. It was harder for him to find the right placement on the seat b/c the dinosaur adds another 1-3 inches of height. He loves the bike though. We just opted to remove the dinosaur and use it as a regular bike.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase for small children
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed visual aesthetics of product as did 18mth old daughter. Simple concept and simple bike with solid construction for small or average size child. Works indoor or out
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Romanello

customer_reviews.title: Little one loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loves this! Looks just like the picture. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike very easy to assemble very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My dog tries to get the dinosaur every time my son gets on it. It is so funny to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: justin Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Every little girl toddler’s Dream!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this unicorn strider for our niece during her 2nd birthday. It’s stylish, fun and riding a unicorn is every little girls dream. So of course our niece loves it! She has been riding it inside of the house up and down the hallway. I recommend this to any parents who have a toddler to prepare to ride a bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Erik H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Personally didn’t like it, my 4 year old is too tall and it was somewhat difficult to assemble and the one screw falls off all the time. Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Better zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper doesn’t stay up as I’d like it too because the head of it is heavier then the rest of the cover, so I have to zip it up multiple times when in use. Other then that we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: gift for 4 yea old
customer_reviews.text: loves it wanted to seep in costume crazy about dnosaurs
customer_reviews.author: Patti E.

customer_reviews.title: Horse Balance BIKE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with Horses! she is 2. She pushes it around with ease- the horse easily snaps on and off. Totally worth it for a Balance Bike! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Was great gift for my niece. Assembled It the same day she got it and feel in love with it! 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jesus castro

customer_reviews.title: Small but she loves her new stuffed animal friend
customer_reviews.text: When I read about it on your site It made it seem like it would grow with my child and literally she’s almost too small for it and she just got it so I was a little disappointed she loves the stuffed animal that comes off of it though LOL
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Powers

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old who is obsessed with dinosaurs LOVES his new "bike"!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really is almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece’s 2nd birthday and she loves it! It really is great. The only complaint that I can find is the fabric that goes around the wheel supports is very thin and tears easily from the bolts rubbing against it.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn balance bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my granddaughter. She is 4 but small. She loves the bike!
customer_reviews.author: Frances fallon

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Love this and my 2 yo is doing well on it. It is a bit big for her still but she will learn to balance.
customer_reviews.author: Sherye N Stephany

customer_reviews.title: YVOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to even get this put together yet. I'm sure it's great. Will leave a better review when the gift is given to my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching bike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 3 year old toddler , the cover makes the child wanna ride it more
customer_reviews.author: DJ Dont stop

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old loves the dinosaur. A great addition would be dinosaur sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Elma Loreto

customer_reviews.title: You can take off the dinosaur and wash it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. Since he can not petal yet this was perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is delighted with his horsey.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson took to this horse-bike immediately and was thrilled with it. He continues to talk to it and treat it as a favorite stuffie as well as ride on it.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute little bike for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Super cute—but with horse off seat is very hard-and horse head frequently comes unlatched.
customer_reviews.author: kscola01

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: I can't say much right now because it's my son's Christmas gift. But it does look nice and seems sturdy. Will update review.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Finley

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the ride on because it doesn't have batteries and gets them to exercise- super cute
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves it. Wish it had a kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienna French

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased My Buddy Wheels, but so far happy with products.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is perfect size for my 23 month old. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Perfect Christmas gift for my 2 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Buck

customer_reviews.title: age requirements
customer_reviews.text: quick and easy ordering, quick delivery, easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Button breaks
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute little bike. However the plate buttons with the fabric is kinda cheap and will pull a part.
customer_reviews.author: Crums

product_meta.title: Yvolution My Buddy Wheels Dino Unicorn Horse Balance Bike with Plush Toy | Training Bicycle for Toddlers Age 2 Years +
feature_bullets: 🐴 IT'S MORE THAN JUST A BIKE - Toddlers have so much fun with their Buddy they don’t realise they are learning the fundamental skills needed for cycling. Balance, speed, stability, strength, and most of all confidence.

🐴 CLEVER DISGUISE - Climbing onto a dinosaur and going on big adventures with their buddy unicorn and horse captures a toddlers' imagination like nothing else, and makes the traditionally scary task of learning to ride a bike an exciting experience.
🐴 WASHABLE & REMOVABLE - Our soft and fluffy Unicorn, Dino and Horse buddies are easily removable and can be washed in a washing machine.
🐴 YEARS OF FUN - The seat height and handlebar height can be adjusted to ‘evolve’ with your kids ensuring a best fit from 18 months +, or up to 44 lbs.

🐴 SAFETY DESIGN - Higher ground clearance is designed for safer play and easier riding on uneven surfaces. With rigorous testing with larger children we are proud of the durability of our balance bikes and their rubber puncture-proof wheels.
